songs.title: EAT part 2
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]

It's Red Lyfe (2x)
Nobody safe anymore
Had to wake you niggas up
I couldn't wait anymore
Got so much shit on my mind
Couldn't think anymore
I swear when this album drop
They gonna hear me some more
You gonna see red everywhere
Like a steak when it's raw
Fuck around and call me M.A Skakur
Imma take them to war
Top of the hill
That's me waving at [?]
Couldn't wait to be on
These rappers hate to be born
Speaking of birth, I just wanna thank my mother
For having me after she had my brother
All that pain and that suffer
She ain't just have me natural, the doctor they had to cut her
C-section but what a blessing
Who would of guessed it the next best is, nobody expected
Me, a she
Nigga accept that i'm here
I swear to god i ain't scared of these niggas damn
I must really perfan these niggas because they
Call me a dyke, a faggot, a gay bitch, a hatian, that hate shit
The hatred, god damn!
That just make you look less of a man fam
To shit on y'all is part of the game plan and
They just mad cause i beat the pussy like bam bam
Because im making these bitches twerk on they hand stands
Nobody talking that talk the way i talk it dudes
Word to sky how i see it is how i call it duke
I open doors that they walking through
Not to brag but its important too, cause they'll forget
Like i ain't kill shit like an abortion true
Don't you knew its RedLyfe, we call it red if you call it blue
And why you guys too busy bringin' them foreigns through
Yeah flexing and stunting doing what ballers do
I leave with your bitch at the same club that you brought her to
And she a cool guy i'll tell her to bring her daughter too
When i was broke i never hated i just waited to flex
Cause in my mind i already knew i was next
All i do is finesse
Straight bands got a few in this tech
Like jail calls all i do is collect
My stress level up but this is what i do when i'm stressed
I make her go down like the sun do when it set
I hear you talking but i don't consider you as a threat
Whats the name? you don't consider who as a threat?
Exactly its M.A nigga i move as a threat
They try to knock me and its funny cause they doing they best
Shake the haters off like a dog do when it's wet
I'll run down on em like a dog do when it fetch
Rollie face blue look like somebody losing they breath
(it's cool)
They can hate still ain't losing a check, real niggas know what's up, i ain't losing respect
I'm like blunt i let the bars move through your flesh
The more fame the more problems man believe me
But i ain't going no where nigga they need me
I eat this hating shit for breakfast ah! they feed me
To beat me is like climbing mountains
The 3 peats niggas mad cause my bitch bad
We throw ones on strippers then we watch them stuff racks
In they tip bags, i used to sell O's by the zipbags
And we smoke [?] not no zigzags
My goons in the phil not the internet
I hate when niggas use the internet to send a threat
Feds watching so we ain't really into that
That's your life you gotta live with that
When the hate don't work they start telling lies
Thats real shit thats why these haters be coming like flies       get it?
Don't let those lines go over your mind
But imma keep shitting on them i hope you don't mind
All that hating and they still ain't paid yet, by the way
I got a 100 bands stuffed in these bay sweats
Got bags full of money still ain't been to the bank yet
I ain't really had time to deposit these [?] checks
I used to chase checks now that money coming
I'm talking fast real fast like that money running
Blue dye on my hand on these hands from all that money touching, blue dye on my pants from all that money rubbing
Damn i got a lot of bash from that phone shit its the ones
That think they know but never know shit
Shorty know i was playing just on some joke shit
Yeah that henny played a part we drunk the whole shit
Man they gotta understand its just a road shit
We just be fucking around regular show shit
I wasn't gonna to say nothing was gonna hold shit
But they made it seem like i was on some hoe shit never that!
I been humbled and im still humbled
And to the ones that turned on me man i still love you
Keys said bro fuck em they gon still bump you
And all these hoes that wanna fuck you they gonna
Still want you, you know haters gonna dick ride
They gonna still suck you
And all these groupie ass niggas they gonna still bug you
Just dont let the devil take your good spirits from you
Just pray on it, stay focused, keep your vision tunneled
I love my team i swear it's like we move in a hurdle
I don't let this shit affect me i move in a bubble
I swear my haters move in a bundle
It's like they all come together like a fucking puzzle
Till that thing go click like a seat buckle
But i just smoke and sip the henny till i'm seeing double
My money long i can't afford to even be in trouble
Accomplished so much and i ain't tryna see it crumble
Been working so much that i don't even see the hustle
I just been flexing like you see a muscle
Fighting these demons they don't see the rumble
Hold the ball they rather see you fumble
You act so low they rather be above you
You need a drink? nah i need a couple. i'm just being honest
I'm being real i swear im being modest i don't gotta be fly
I'm fly in my pockets, i'd rather invest money and triple my profits
The flyest niggas be broke and it's eating they conscious
Cause they pretending, they try to wear all these designers
You call it designer i call it disguising
Ma speaking that knowledge, yeah i had to remind em
Gotta preach 'em that real, gotta teach them that trill
And this game is no love either kill or be killed
I get head from your bitch, and it's fuck how you feel
I ain't tryna be funny but i get dough like a deal
Give me all the attention i need all the attention
Bout to drop me a tape collect all the commission
My goons ready for war, told them hold they position
They like Ma you sure? i'm ready to blow with the Smith &
They don't understand controversy made me hot
So how the fuck you think the haters gonna make me stop
They forgot that doctor ...'s post made me pop, i love this shit
This the shit that really made me guap, anyway
I'm done talking to em back to this money, some of y'all
Is a joke and i laugh cause it's funny, but imma go and sip
This tea, yo pass me the honey,  its M.A motherfucker
And i'm back on my bully

[part two of freestyle]
I don't understand bro how niggas have time to hate
It's so much money out here

Call the homie Jay like let's go get this money man
(Yeah x6)
Now when i find a ......
So we started working working till that cash came
(yeah x6)
All of a sudden all these bitches want my last name
The way these niggas hate i hope they get a check for it
Maybe not but you'll get checked for it
I hope you pay your bills before you pay attention
How you a hatin' ass nigga bout to get evicted
Old [?] born nigga wearing panties put some drawers on
Nigga chearleader on pum pums
Niggas see the barrel on this gun i call him long John, nigga
When he shoot you be long gone
